input.sentences: a group of friends went out to have a night out on the city .
the evening started with a few drinks .
they watched a parade that celebrated the day of the dead .
there was so many interesting things to see during the parade .
output.sentences: Two couples met while walking in the local city park
They hadn't seen each other for some time so decided to go to the local watering hole for a few drinks.
They stayed longer than they expected and it was dark by the time they left.
Little did they know there was a Day of the Dead parade starting .  They decided to stay and watch the parade
They all laughed at the skeletons in the parade, and that some skeletons were dog skeletons.
